title: The Third Post
content: Dear Livejournal: I wish I could continue to write my blog in Latin, or at least I believe the language above is latin, but from hereafter I shall speak in plain English. I could really go for a donut right about now, and maybe a Redbull. I am very excited to go to Disney World for the first time in March of 2019. The years will drag on in such an untoward manner, but there's a part of me that feels as if it'll be September of 2018 in the blink of an eye.
